Posts.Content: cywillis wrote: Does anyone know why the MATCH trial was suspended a few days ago? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: NCI-MATCH Clinical Trial cywillis zarovka

Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2017 02:20PM cywillis wrote: if you look at NCT02465060 on the clinicaltrials.gov website, and open the "Study Locations" link, it shows the status of almost all of the 1000+ locations as "Suspended" or "Withdrawn." I suspect that the few that say "Recruiting" haven't updated their status yet.
Posts.Title: NCI-MATCH Clinical Trial cywillis zarovka
